item.description:
We play assorted games suitable for family, friendly, and serious play, known as Euro games or German-style games. Examples include Caylus, Dominion, Power Grid, Puerto Rica, Ra, Stone Age, Ticket to Ride, and Evo.

New gamers welcome. Rules are taught before games.

We finish around 6:00. I do not plan food for this event; we will focus on games, and folks can go out to dinner afterward.

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: Merrimack Casual Strategy Games
